website_summaries.verdict: An extremely durable and easy-to-use digital machine for precise sewing action with excellent variable speeds.
pros: We love how it comes with 30 built-in stitches, including 16 utility stitches, 6 one-step buttonholes, and 8 decorative stitches
The built-in LED display will show you the stitch you're using
Features a double-lift presser foot to make it easier to work with thicker fabrics
cons: Some users report difficulty with the tension

customer_reviews.title: Sews straight even stitches for making masks.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and was happy about that. The machine works great and is very similar to my beloved Kenmore. I do miss the easier reverse button since this one is small and the 4th of 4 similar buttons on the front. I attached a clear raised rubber bottom on it just to keep from hitting the wrong button. Would have been nice to have a case but I'll order that later. For some fabrics it pays to either hold the threads behind for the 1st stitches but I'm getting more in the habit of using stitch swatches before and after. You'll be happy to have that automatic needle threader. Overall, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Janome sewing machine. I'm am far from a experienced sewer but I find this machine so easy to use. I'm finding it pretty powerful in sewing through several layers of fabric and is very quiet. Definitely glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Best ever sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of machines and this one is hands down the best! I had a sewing machine repair person recommend it, and she was right! So easy to use. Sews like butter! Beautiful stitching. Very quiet. Well made. Love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: barbara foote

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get used to at first
customer_reviews.text: I had my Kenmore sewing machine since I was in middle school. I have been making doll clothes and other items for my 3 grandkids and it seemed like with every project my machine would start to jam up. After fixing it twice I was finally convinced to get a new machine. SO GLAD I DID! And this machine is so awesome! Probably the best feature for me is the self threading needle at my age. I got every bit and more out of my Kenmore after 40 some years and I'm sure I'll be saying the same 30 years from now!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Foltz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this machine
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this machine. I am an advanced quilter and wanted a work horse without all the bells and whistles. I believe I have gotten my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Tatania Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality Machine
customer_reviews.text: Runs smoothly, many features I didn't expect. Easy to change stitches. Has a feature that threads the needle. You can view the bobbin while sewing to see how much thread is left. I really like this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D. Castellion

customer_reviews.title: Sewed through 6 layers of denim with no problem
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this machine. Previously owned a Singer and was constantly fighting tension and bobbin battles. This machine has worked great right out of the box. Sewed through 6 layers of denim without any problems, and no adjustments after previously sewing thin cotton. Seems very sturdy and easy to use. I like sewing again. I don't do any fancy sewing - just basic patterns and alterations, so works absolutely wonderfully for my needs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J&N O

customer_reviews.title: It is a great sewing machine.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and my wife has been thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Mabey

customer_reviews.title: great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy to operate features of this machine. It is lightweight and sews beautifully. I highly recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this brand- Janome, over other brands. I was looking to spend less, but decided to get a better machine, so I went with this one. Easy to learn to use (I use to sew, so there wasn't a big learning curve). Love how it is computerized. That's easy too. Just having so much fun using it. And it is sewing just as I ask it to do. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Frances G. Gunther

customer_reviews.title: A must buy machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Best purchase I have made to date on amazon. Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: kathy lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, sturdy machine.
customer_reviews.text: Janome is a great brand. I had another Janome for a few years and really put it through the ringer with no trouble - it was the unkillable machine (until I moved across the country, and it arrived on my doorstep in pieces; thanks USPS). So, to replace it...I purchased this machine! I'm very pleased with my choice. It's great! Very easy to use, no problems whatsoever so far. Most machines have little quirks that you have to get used to, but (knock on wood) this one appears to have no such "character". Very very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O.

customer_reviews.title: still very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for a little over a year and I am still very pleased. I was looking for a machine that wouldn't be overly advanced, somewhat intuitive but allow me to learn new things. The previous machine I had was 30 years old and learning new techniques had become frustrating due it requiring constant fiddling. I am very pleased with my purchase. I have been able to focus on new techniques instead of trying to make the machine behave. The feed system is very smooth, and the electronic tension allows me to switch between projects with out excessive "fiddling". Great for beginners and advanced sewers alike.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirl1220

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sewing machine. Been sewing for 40 years and this is the best machine I've had. Good quality for your money, if you can't afford an expensive machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Research paid off. Read lots of reviews and ask several seamstress friends for recommendations. This was a good value for a seasoned amateur seamstress wanting to move into the 20th century. Very versatile machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received a used machine!(
customer_reviews.text: I received a used machine. Was disgusted to find a strand of hair on the feed dogs and a scratch on the top, front side. This was supposed to be brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Molly's mom

customer_reviews.title: nice & smooth
customer_reviews.text: was bought as replacement for 25 year old machine. i forgot how smoothly a machine could run.
customer_reviews.author: R.Garry Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, GREAT machine!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for shipping this sewing machine to me so quickly! I am making masks for hospitals, cops, doctors, and local people! The machine works GREAT and it is so quiet! Thanks again for getting the machine to me so quickly so I could continue to make the masks! ❤️🍑💛💚💙💜💖
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful machine with very easy set up and smooth operation. Arrived very quickly and well packaged thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new machine
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 50 year old Singer with Janome Magnolia. It’s a great machine! Easy to thread, easy to wind bobbin, easy to use. Highly recommend this machine and this seller. The machine arrived before the estimated date. It was well packaged, so it arrived undamaged and with all promised accessories.
customer_reviews.author: BeachBuddy

customer_reviews.title: So far, it's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this machine once, but so far, it's pretty good. The major thing I don't like about it is the last few steps for the thread path cannot be seen without physically tipping the machine -- poor machine design. The manual leaves something to be desired, as well. I'm happy, however, with the functionality of the machine. After my first use, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mason's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a different brand and it was horrible. Sent it back and got this one. I love it! Easy to use. I really like the self threader and several other features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use andight weight
customer_reviews.text: This is my backup machine. I own a Janomie serger and a professional series sewing machine. The Magnolia machine is great for taking to classes. I love it. Very easy to thread. Even as a stand alone machine id reccomend this one. I sew a lot every day making quilts
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine for normal sewing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Easy to thread, use. Great for those of us who sew hems, mend etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hudnall

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine. A work horse. Powerful and great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best sewing machines I’ve ever had. I’ve used it everyday since it arrived and I haven’t had any major issues. This is my first electronic machine so it was definitely a pleasant surprise see how easy it was to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my sewing machine. I love the button to stop and start so I don't have to use the foot pedal because of my ankle being fused. It is a great beginner quilting machine and so far it is doing a great job. My sister bought the same one and she loves hers also
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth the pretty penny!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little pricey, but worth it. It sews like a dream
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Ms Magnolia is a great gal!
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby. She is everything I wanted. I like the fact that the machine is heavy and sturdy. It runs very quietly and is quite simple to learn its features. I made the right choice!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M Holman

customer_reviews.title: Great machine - hassle free
customer_reviews.text: I'd had a Husqvarna that was always giving me trouble. I finally decided I needed a new machine. Saw this on Amazon and decided to give it a try. WOW. What a great little machine. Sews though thick and thin material with ease. Been using it non-stop and I love it! It cost a quarter of what the Husqvarna cost, but sews so much better. Very solid machine that I'm sure will give me years of service.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful buttonholes
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this machine. I also have a 20-year-old Janome that is still going strong. They have improved the buttonhole technology and this machine makes beautiful buttonholes.
customer_reviews.author: d'joy

customer_reviews.title: Quilting
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Janine! It’s my new best friend!!🧵. Quilters will relate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but I must admit I did something ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but I must admit I did something wrong. The silver screw on the top of my machine. Looked like a bobbin part. So I tried to unscrew it and it would not come out. Well I then went to the manual. Well I am trying to screw it back in. Is there a certain point with the screw that it has to be tight. HELP
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Works wonderfully. The only setback personally seen is the buttonhole feature does not seem to work correctly. User tries to utilize this feature and with hope it will continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Solid and reliable sewing machine. You may never use the foot pedal, since the power button is conveniently located. Auto threader is helpful. Any problems you are likely to experience are going to be operator,not machine errors.Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my Janome Magnolia
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Janome Magnolia. It is so easy to use and does a beautiful job. I am very pleased with it. Nancy Hardwick
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: once again a winner
customer_reviews.text: have had many janome machines over the years can't be without sewing in my day - speed control and foot free start and stop are a winner in this light weight machine - just as good as my very old 9000 - no need for the embroidery aspect so this does the trick
customer_reviews.author: alice todd

customer_reviews.title: janome sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: best sewing machine my wife has used, she is still learning how to use
customer_reviews.author: gbourdon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine, however I would have appreciated if a 1/4 inch foot would have been included with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Prindle

customer_reviews.title: excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the machine, its performance is exactly as advertised. Would recommend this product and vendor to other sewing equipment users
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Jones

customer_reviews.title: my new magnolia
customer_reviews.text: am having soo much fun with this machine...my first computerized machine, and it does a great job so far, so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki A. Tomsha

customer_reviews.title: Well liked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to replace an old Singer. She loves it but I can offer little more in specifics.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good basic sewing machine.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good basic machine. I am not experienced at sewing. It meets my needs. The back stitch button is in an odd place, I have to stop seeing and look for it to secure the stitch.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had time to use it yet but I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had time to use it yet but I got my daughter the same machine and she is just learning to see and she loves hers and has finished her first project
customer_reviews.author: Janet Yngsdal

customer_reviews.title: Singer instead
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with it. Returned and replaced with a Singer. Better price and better equipped.
customer_reviews.author: J K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I had read all of these great reviews about this machine - and GreatSewingMachineReviews.com rated it the best machine under $400! It worked great the first few times I used it... and then I've had nothing but problems! I keep getting loops on the back of my fabric and turning the tension dial changes nothing! I've done everything the book says to do to troubleshoot! I'm going to call Janome to see if there's anything else I can do, otherwise I'm returning the machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: magnolia 7330
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been excellent. Love it. I had a brother machine and old viking. They both were unbearable with jamming, needle breakage, bad tension. This one, I cannot even explain, what a pleasure it gives me when it glides with ease. So far I hemmed several moleskin trousers and jeans, made a cover for the piano, and did a lot of little tailoring. I did a research before I bought it and I agree this one is the best for one like me not an advanced more like a beginner in sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine. I brought it because I was a beginner, and I needed a lot of help! One of the greatest helpful features for me was the ability to sew at a very slow speed. I am no longer a novice, so I can sew at a faster pace, and I have that ability to do so. This machine has great features, it is perfect for the beginner, and continues to be just as perfect for the duration of ownership!
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: So sad I had such high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give this a high rating as it has been nothing but a pain it skips stitches, tension won’t stay even and it won’t stay threaded. Sorry I purchased it. Let’s hope the dealer is helpful
customer_reviews.author: abby widman

customer_reviews.title: Great Janome machine
customer_reviews.text: I have another Janome, the home "industrial" machine (the 1600 HP, I think) with only a straight stitch. I'm in love with that machine for heavy duty sewing like slipcovers, draperies, etc. I wanted to update my other machine (with zigzag and other more "dressmaking friendly" features), so I decided to get another Janome. This Magnolia 7330 was highly, highly rated, and I'm not disappointed. My next purchase will be to update my old serger with a Janome serger. I love Janome products.
customer_reviews.author: E. Casagrande

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have sewn for 45 years and recently purchased this Janome Magnolia sewing machine to replace my machine that died. I love this machine, easy to set up, thread, and sew on. I mostly do basic sewing so haven't tried all the extra stitches but enjoy what I've used it for so far! Would purchase again if I had the need to.
customer_reviews.author: hoovj

customer_reviews.title: Haven't sewed in 30 years but my daughter highly recommended a Janome
customer_reviews.text: Haven't sewed in 30 years but my daughter highly recommended a Janome, received this one for Christmas...have only made one thing so far yet but really love all the improvements in sewing machines in the past three decades! Very easy to use....and such a good deal with the case included.
customer_reviews.author: gatorparker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine
customer_reviews.text: Great sewing machine. I opened the box, read the instructions and was up and sewing in 45 minutes. I love how easy the automatic threader is and how quiet the machine is. Bobbin winding is a breeze and the machine is light weight. So far I am extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: K.Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the Janome 7330
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for a few weeks and I am very happy with it. It is very easy to thread the needle and the drop in bobbin is very nice to have. I bought this one because it has the automatic needle threader and a lot of built in stitches that I may use in the future. Seems like a heavy duty machine and sewing on this machine is a joy.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: She loves it as it was so easy to set up and begin sewing right away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my wife's Singer. She loves it as it was so easy to set up and begin sewing right away.It is quiet and all features work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R.

customer_reviews.title: I COULDN'T BE ANY HAPPIER. THE SEWING MACHINE IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I COULDN'T BE ANY HAPPIER. THE SEWING MACHINE IS GREAT. I ENJOY SEWING AGAIN. ITS THE EASIEST SEWING MACHINE I HAVE EVER USED.
customer_reviews.author: BIRDLADY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: I've only used Singer and Brother machines in the past. I've always heard good things about Janome, so I ordered one. I really love this machine. It's smooth and easy to use. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: judyannemt

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine!!!! I have always had Elnas until I got talked into a big Bernina. I am still disappointed in it - $3500 machine and not near the quality of my new Magnolia. Besides everything that fit my Elnas can now also be used with my Magnolia (feet, bobbins, walking foot, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This machine was purchased as a travel partner for my Bernina Quilter. Needed something light weight to take to Bees and on trips. The Janome 7330 was nearly perfect for this. It was a little heavier than I would have preferred, but it was the best choice of the light weights that still had the mussel to get the job done quilting. So far very happy with this choice. I have taken it on one extended trip and used this machine to make a baby quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Collector

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and durable
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old daughter used the schoolmate version at her middle school. She was thrilled to get as a gift, identical to what she was used to!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great features
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an old sewing machine. I couldn't be happier with my purchase! I am a novice sewer - This is easy to use and convenient features like the thread cutter and needle threader make it that much more user friendly. I have had no trouble using this on multiple projects and cant wait to use it on more.
customer_reviews.author: Dileria1

customer_reviews.title: Great for advanced beginner
customer_reviews.text: A breeze to thread! Super easy to switch stitches. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This will be my backup machine. So far it’s a great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: happy tastebuds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this machine !!! Excellent quality and performance ! Lightweight and so easy to use !
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with a Jenome sewing machine. A great machine at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hoard

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to learn, way better than I realized. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic, hardworking sewing machine. I spent some time reading reviews on amazon and, knowing nothing about this brand, purchased it online. I'm completely happy with this machine. It's well-made and I bet I have the thing for the rest of my life. I told a friend that I bought a Janome and was unfamiliar with the brand. She says her favorite old standby is a Janome. I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: Hotpsyche

customer_reviews.title: Very happy other than some minor design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this sewing machine overall. There are a couple of things I consider design flaws. The reverse button is above the needle and the position is a bit awkward to me. Also, I reasonably large hands, and I find it awkward to thread the needle because of the placement of the reverse button over the needle. Other than those issues, it is a wonderful machine, very easy to operate and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Block

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: sews like a dream and quiet! Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Practice, practice and it gets easier
customer_reviews.text: I am learning to sew and enjoying it! I was very scared to try the machine after I received it but once I started, it's been easier than it looked!
customer_reviews.author: Birthday Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for beginner to moderate sewing
customer_reviews.text: The machine is perfect. I upgraded from a brother, base model and just love it. Its easy to set up and does it a duties as expected. If you sew often or sporadically, this machine will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So Far It's Love!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had my Janome very long but so far it's Love! I read all the reviews and I haven't been disappointed. It is easy to operate and very quiet, especially on the slow speed. The quietness of it allows you to sew and be on speakerphone at the same time:). I have a Brother that I really love, but this Janome has already surpassed it. I love that you can choose if your needle stops in the up or down position and you can disengage the foot pedal and use the start/stop button instead. It has a drop-in, see-through bobbin and a needle threader, as well as, a thread cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our granddaughter. Easy to use and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Sharlin

customer_reviews.title: Good entry-level Computerized Sewing Machine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift - recipient very pleased. This was for a relative who does some garment and craft sewing. Delivered very promptly by vendor. Referred to other reviews and for the price delivers all the features needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Found the operating instructions somewhat confusing. I have sewn ...
customer_reviews.text: Found the operating instructions somewhat confusing. I have sewn for over 45 years and nearly returned this because of the directions! I just had to figure out procedures on my own.
customer_reviews.author: mth

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine based on reviews. But, I found the tension a bit testy and had problems adjusting it. I returned the machine and purchased the 3160QDC from a dealer. Which came with a year's worth of classes, teaching different techniques on how to use the machine. This machine wasn't bad, but the tension issue bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: tracey hall

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES her Janome Magnolia! She has a beginner Singer for a while until I surprised her with this for Christmas- So smooth, well constructed and she says it feels so good to sew with! SOLID.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for five minutes, and it's going back. It sounds wrong, and it certainly sews incorrectly. Every stitch is different than the one before. I adjusted tension, but it's obviously a flawed machine. I am disappointed because it's the second Janome in a row to arrive with problems. A few weeks ago I ordered the DC 2012. While it's stitches and sounds are normal, the lock stitch makes holes in all thicknesses of fabric, the bobbin thread was a pia to pull up - not automatic, and it pulls/feeds to one side. I fought to keep fabric feeding straight. So sad about Janome, because I am also done with Brother machines. Neeeext!
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loving this after getting used to simple sewing with it. Haven't tried many things yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alice L Grow

product_meta.title: Janome 7330 Computerized Sewing Machine Bundle with Purple Tote, One 10-Pack Janome Bobbins, One Pack Size 14 Needles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars211 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
